channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:27 Air alert in Volyn region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:27 Air alert in Volyn region. Follow further messages. #Volyn_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
